comments.comment: mu thama nidan hora  dan sudana thaththage prathirupaya pennala thamai thatha giye  marunanama  minissu kiribath kawe hure damme darmika bawa nisa  gam udawak thibba gewal tikak haduwa kiyala karapu jada wada makenna minissu marapuwa tire wala dala puchchapuwa  sudu van walin ussanna purudu kale muge thaththa ahapiywu apen  ahinsak kollo kello pawa maruwa jvp  kiyala jvp ekata hamudawe pawa pahadeemak thibuna ussana marana ewata  muge thaththa kalu balallu kiyala wenama unit ekak hadan hitiye hamudawe pawulwala aya maruwa jvp  ekata bara wena widiyata unge nama yanna  eetapasse hamudawath jvp kiyala eke hitapu un nathi un serama maruwa hunuwataya potha thiyan hitapu lamai pawa issuwa maruwa thamanta tharagayak dei kiyala hithapu thamangema pakshe hitapu ihala pele manthri waru maruwa iskole yana podi kello kanyawo ona kiyala pujawaktada mohokatada unwa ussala  maruwa kisi kenekuta katha karanna baha hitler wage ekadipathi palanayak genichche  lawariya wikunapu pakaya munt a parana minissu putuwak dunna idaganna ada parilimenthuwe sudana wenawa minissunta muge gewal deepu eka mathakai munge maha eka karapuwa mathaka naha ahapiyawu apen  api eda bayen iskole giya lamay thopita mona daha jara wadak kalath kamak naha deyak dunna nam e athi  ekai deshapaluwo thopilata boru porondu deela chande ganne haden hal denawa laga thiyana ekath ekka ata 8 denawa keewama kasippu bothaleta bath packet ekata chande denawa balapiyawu mun sill aran wage katha karana hati api marila hitiya nam kamak nah
